init_hint_text: Join {{currency}} now, easily obtain {{currency}} tokens and start your asset appreciation journey!
pledge_personal_hint_text: During the staking period, your held Alpaca will be lockedon the platform, and you cannot transfer or use these tokens. You can receive the staking reward daily.
pledge_team_hint_text: You can check who among the team members participatesin the staking here. According to the team level, you canobtain the corresponding staking commission.
boot_sub_title_1: Decentralized, transparent, and efficient value transfer
boot_hint_text_1: {{currency}} coin was born out of an understanding of decentralization, transparency, and efficient value transfer. We are committed to creating a stable, secure, and highly adaptable virtual currency, which will become an important supporting tool for future digital economy and blockchain technology applications. {{currency}} coin is not just a trading medium, but also a carrier of value transmission in the digital age.
boot_sub_title_2: Global digital assetization, decentralized finance, smart contracts
boot_hint_text_2: The future of {{currency}} coin is not limited to the current ecosystem. With the continuous development of technology and the launch of public chains, {{currency}} coin will be applied in a wider range of scenarios, including cutting-edge fields such as decentralized finance (DeFi), smart contracts, and asset digitization. Our goal is to make {{currency}} an important part of the global economic system, promoting the circulation and innovation of digital assets worldwide.
boot_title_3: Strong technological foundation and compliance assurance
boot_sub_title_3: Strong security, public chain architecture, more opportunities for extension
boot_hint_text_3: {{currency}} coin is based on a public chain architecture, which will provide higher scalability, lower transaction costs, and stronger security. Our team has developed a detailed compliance strategy to ensure the compliance and sustainable development of {{currency}} coin. In the future, {{currency}} Coin will support multiple decentralized applications (DApps), providing investors with more opportunities to participate.
boot_sub_title_4: Multi partner mode, leading technology, ecological construction
boot_hint_text_4: To ensure the healthy development of the {{currency}} coin ecosystem, we will establish strategic partnerships with leading global blockchain technology companies, financial institutions, and enterprises. Through these collaborations, {{currency}} Coin will not only drive the development of the digital economy, but also provide investors with more value-added services and investment opportunities.
boot_sub_title_5: Significant returns on investing in digital assets for the future
boot_hint_text_5: Investing in {{currency}} coin is not only about investing in a digital asset, but also about investing in the future. We firmly believe that {{currency}} coin will become an important part of the global financial system, bringing considerable returns to investors. Join the global community of {{currency}} Coin and witness the future of the digital economy with us.
node_apply_hint_text1: · Community Creation: Establish and manage your own community on the platform, expanding its scale and your personal influence.
node_apply_hint_text3: · Sales Rewards: Earn 10% rewards from NFT sales, boosting community growth.
node_apply_hint_text4: · Staking Rewards: Receive 10% staking token rewards, maximizing your earnings.
node_apply_hint_text2:
Lock 2000USDT to apply as a reserve super node, After becoming a reserve super node, all {{currency}} tokens purchased through P2P will automatically participate in the POS mining pool until they become an official super nade, When the {{currency}} particpating in PoS mining reaches 200000, it can be conwertedinto an official super node, and 2000USDT locked in the warehouse will be returned.
The preliminary super node that meets the requirements first will be converted into a formal super node and enjoy the rights and interests of the super node forever. The reserve super node that does not meet the requirements in three months will cancel the super node rights and return the 2000USDT locked in the warehouse, $pecial Prize Pool: 3% of the daily network PÃS number is used as the Super Node speciaprize pool, which is shared equally by all super nodes and settled to available assets in real time。

withdraw_dialog_title: The withdrawal feature is coming soon! 💸
withdraw_dialog_hint_1:
Thank you for supporting the {{currency}} Chain community!
We are about to launch the withdrawal feature. Through the {{currency}}-to-USDT route, you can directly withdraw USDT to your personal wallet.
withdraw_dialog_hint_2: 🌟 Act now! Take this opportunity to mine and share with your friends to maximize your earnings!
withdraw_dialog_hint_3: 🔵 Start inviting now—withdrawals are about to open!
collection_delete_dialog_text: Do you confirm to delete the wallet address?
service_hint_text1: 1.This NFT allows {{amount}} purchase opportunities, first come, first served.
service_hint_text2: 2.Earn {{amount}} {{currency}} daily, boosting your mining speed. Claim to receive rewards.
service_hint_text3: 3.Valid for {{days}} days, with a total return of {{rota}}.
exchange_hint_text1: Suggested Withdrawal Time: Local time 8:00 AM - 11:00 PM
exchange_hint_text2: 1.Since users come from various countries with different time zones, it is recommended to initiate withdrawals between 8:00 AM and 11:00 PM local time. Typically, funds will be credited within 1-2 hours.
exchange_hint_text3: 2.Withdrawals made outside this period may take longer, usually processed by T+1. Thank you for your understanding!
task_join_x_title: Share, comment, and like this tweet.
security_hint_text: In order to protect the security of your wallet address, please follow the steps below to ensure the security of your account !
security_g_hint_text: Search through Google Play for Android phones and download through the app store for Apple phones. The icon is as follows：
security_content_title_2: Open Google Authenticator, click "+" in the lower right corner, click to enter the set key, enter the name and select the key, and click "Add"
exchange_zero_error_text: Input amount must be greater than 0.
prize_pool_rule_text1: 1.The event lasts for {{num}} days, with a countdown displayed on the page.
prize_pool_rule_text2: 2.Invite {{num}} people to share the prize pool. The faster you reach the goal, the higher the bonus.
prize_pool_rule_text3: 3.After the event starts, you must use the event invitation link to share.
prize_pool_rule_text4: 4.After the event ends, the bonus will be automatically credited to your USDT account.
prize_pool_sub_title: Hurry up and share the prize pool
prize_pool_tips_text: Use the link above for sharing.
prize_pool_fill_hint_text: You have qualified to participate in the prize pool. After the expiration date, the bonus will automatically be credited to your personal account.
prize_pool_w_hint_text: The prize pool has been drawn you received reward
withdraw_nft_hint_text: There are currently numerous individuals and organizations maliciously attacking the {{currency}} Chain. Protecting the community is an ur{{currency}}t priority. We will conduct three rounds of security verification. For each NFT purchased, a 35% return will be provided after three days. We hope everyone understands and supports this initiative.
withdraw_nft_help_text: To prevent malicious actions against {{currency}} Chain, we require you to purchase NFTs as a means to identify and exclude individuals and organizations engaging in destructive behavior. This will help purify the community and support its long-term development. We appreciate the understanding and support of {{currency}} partners. This event will be initiated 3 consecutive times to block malicious actors from gaining entry.
withdraw_i_dialog_content_1: 1.Non-NFT users have a maximum withdrawal limit of {{amount}}U, while NFT users have no withdrawal limit.
withdraw_i_dialog_content_2: 2.Only one withdrawal is allowed per day. As the community develops securely, these restrictions will gradually be relaxed.
home_task_tw_sub_title: Leave your invitation link in the comments below this tweet.
address_add_hint_text: Only BEP20 wallet addresses are supported.
team_dialog_content:
1. Token Rewards:
• Direct: 10% of direct referrals’ mining.
• Indirect: 2% of indirect referrals’ mining.
2. NFT Rewards:
• Direct: 10% USDT rebate for NFT purchases.
• Indirect: 2% USDT reward for NFT purchases.
nft_invite_page_rule_text_1: 1.Invite friends to purchase NFTs, and {{amount}} {{currency}} will be instantly credited to your account.
nft_invite_page_rule_text_3: 3.The more friends you invite to purchase, the more rewards you earn.
a_mining_rule_content_text1: 1.Complete the mining task by inviting others to earn rewards.
a_mining_rule_content_text2: 2.Invitations must be shared using the mining machine's referral link.
a_mining_rule_content_text3: 3.Users who have already been invited cannot be invited again.
a_mining_rule_content_text4: 4.Once the task is completed, the mining speed will take effect after claiming {{currency}}.
home_task_fb_post_title: Share a post about {{currency}} on Facebook
activity_turntable_rule_content1: 1.You have 3 free chances to spin the wheel every day.
activity_turntable_rule_content2: 2.For each person you invite, you will receive an additional 3 chances.
activity_turntable_rule_content3: 3.The rewards from the spin will be directly credited to your account.
activity_turntable_rule_content4: 4.Invitations must be sent through the referral link from the wheel to be valid.
activity_turntable_reward_title: Wheel spin lottery reward has been issued.
